Name: Fish Hatchery
Description: A basin for hatching fishes from roes. Hatches are random for normal roes except for Sturgeon Roe. Requires Fish Food.

DescriptionLocalization.zh: 用于孵化鱼卵的水池。除了鲟鱼外的普通鱼子的孵化率是随机的。需要鱼食。
